words.name: dictionary
words.description: a reference book that contains words listed in alphabetical order and that gives information about the words' meanings, forms, pronunciations, etc

words.name: car
words.description: a vehicle that has four wheels and an engine and that is used for carrying passengers on roads

words.name: fix
words.description: to make (something) whole or able to work properly again

words.name: repair
words.description: to put (something that is broken or damaged) back into good condition

words.name: beautiful
words.description: very attractive in a physical way

words.name: crazy
words.description: This sense is no longer used in a serious way and is now usually considered offensive. The phrase mentally ill is preferred

words.name: order
words.description: a statement made by a person with authority that tells someone to do something : an instruction or direction that must be obeyed

words.name: ordered
words.description: carefully organized or controlled

words.name: backstabbing
words.description: harmful and unfair things that are said or done to hurt the reputation of someone

words.name: physiology
words.description: a science that deals with the ways that living things function

words.name: verb
words.description: a word (such as jump, think, happen, or exist) that is usually one of the main parts of a sentence and that expresses an action, an occurrence, or a state of being

words.name: amazing
words.description: causing great surprise or wonder : causing amazement

words.name: quiz
words.description: a short spoken or written test that is often taken without preparation

words.name: edit
words.description: to prepare (something written) to be published or used : to make changes, correct mistakes, etc., in (something written)

words.name: ear
words.description: the part of the body that you hear with

words.name: winded
words.description: unable to breathe easily or normally because you have been running, climbing, etc.

words.name: wander
words.description: to move around or go to different places usually without having a particular purpose or direction

words.name: zap
words.description: to attack, destroy, or kill (someone or something) quickly

words.name: quick
words.description: done or happening in a short amount of time

words.name: astounded
words.description: feeling or showing great surprise or wonder
